column1: Weighted MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in T2, representing the head of a man of 37 years old, with sagittal section n°123 beginning from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1160.1562 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 8023.5352 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 328.2715 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 131.8359 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1719.1406 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 283.4473 mm³, the third ventricle of volume 2.6367 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 79.1016 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1090.2832 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 77.7832 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 270.2637 mm³.
